The Expiation of Assembly - Kaffaratul-M.ARABIC_TEXT: ((سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ)).
The Expiation of Assembly - Kaffaratul-M.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Subhanakal-lahumma wabihamdik, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, astaghfiruka wa-atoobu ilayk.)
The Expiation of Assembly - Kaffaratul-M.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You.  I bear witness that None has the right to be worshipped except You.  I seek Your forgiveness and turn to You in repentance.)
